summary: The document is a declassified memo associated with the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992, focusing on an inquiry into Manuel ESTEVEZ Perez. It details a request for information on Perez to AMMUG/1, who could not identify him, and suggests that a photograph of Perez, if available, be sent to AMMUG/1 for potential identification. The memo concludes with a distribution list showing it was circulated to several recipients.
key_findings: The document is part of the records released under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992.
It involves an inquiry into Manuel ESTEVEZ Perez, with AMMUG/1 being unable to provide identification.
Suggests the use of a photograph for identification purposes if available.
Includes a distribution list indicating the memo was circulated to multiple recipients.
